title: Hamukione
author: Hamukione
content: Hey everyone..I am looking for people who have a blog, news site, or any form of content-based site around cryptocurrency or news related to crypto.I have no requirements for how many users per month you have reading your stuff.But I am looking to network with people, as I am building my own project.So, if you have a site, please write below or send me a PM.I'd love to have a chat, and who knows.. We might be able to help each other grow /Hamukione

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: You might want to move your thread into a more appropriate section: Marketplace (Altcoins).

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: I have contacted and closed with the NFT NFT World News.You can take a look at the website: https://www.nftworldnews.tech/ but still don't really know what you need to get close with blog owner. Did you want to learn or only networking or there has some business-related like paid promotion, etc.If yes, I can connect you with them.
